resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
iurysalino opened a new pull request #12747:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12747


   This adds a new column metadata field ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TYPE_NAME to FlightSQL resultset schemas.
   
   This improvement allows datasources to specify custom data type names on JDBC driver.


-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

lidavidm commented on a change in pull request #12747:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12747#discussion_r837787029



##########
File path: format/FlightSql.proto
##########
@@ -1118,6 +1118,7 @@ message CommandGetDbSchemas {
  *  - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:CATALOG_NAME      - Table's catalog name
  *  - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:DB_SCHEMA_NAME    - Database schema name
  *  - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TABLE_NAME        - Table name
+ *  - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TYPE_NAME         - Type name

Review comment:
       We're going to need to go through the vote again to add the new field.




--

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12747#discussion_r846382574


##########
format/FlightSql.proto:
##########

  *    - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:CATALOG_NAME      - Table's catalog name
  *    - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:DB_SCHEMA_NAME    - Database schema name
  *    - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TABLE_NAME        - Table name
+ *    - ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TYPE_NAME         - Type name

Review Comment:
   I don't think we should use an enum because the values can vary by the sources

jcralmeida commented on PR #12747:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12747#issuecomment-1095457419

   Hey @lidavidm . I've already updated the PR with integration tests to use the new column metadata. However, some of the tests in the CI seems to be failing. I've looked through the errors and they don't seem to be related to any of our changes.

lidavidm commented on PR #12747:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12747#issuecomment-1095494030

   Can you please rebase? That should fix most of the gcsfs related issues.

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.

fields.description:
This adds a new column metadata field ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TYPE_NAME to FlightSQL resultset schemas.

This improvement allows datasources to specify custom data type names on JDBC driver.
fields.summary: [FlightRPC][C++][Java] Add column metadata for type name on FlightSQL
